law.catch_line: To qualify for a license, an applicant shall:...
law.text:
To qualify for a license, an applicant shall:
Show that the home health agency will provide:
Appropriate home health care to patients who may be cared for at a prescribed level of care, in their residence instead of in a hospital; and
Skilled nursing, home health aid, and at least one other home health care service that is approved by the Secretary; and
Meet the requirements of Subtitle 1 of this title for certification of need.
